clinical_study.brief_title: Understanding Evaluation of Patient Information Sheets by User Testing Method
clinical_study.official_title: Understanding Evaluation of Patient Information Sheets of Two Multiple Sclerosis Studies Through User Testing Method in a Randomized, Open Label, Crossover Design

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this randomized, open label, crossover, single site study is to compare the PISs of two Multiple Sclerosis clinical trials to elucidate potential aspects of the given written information that could impact on the smooth running of the studies.

primary_outcome.measure: percentage of found and understood-if-found items

secondary_outcome.measure: understanding of the text expressed by subject
